Module SC2002
Package sc2002

Class CampController

java.lang.Object
sc2002.CampController
public class CampController extends Object
Controller class which controls all the logic related to camps
Since:
24/11/2023
Author:
Edward Seah

    • AddAttendee

      public boolean AddAttendee(int campID, Student student)
      Adds the student to a camp's list of attendees
      Parameters:
      campID - ID of the camp that student wants to register for
      student - Student that wants to register
      Returns:
      True if successfully registered, False otherwise

      public void DeleteCamp(int campID)

    • AddCamp

      public Camp AddCamp(String campName, String date, String registerCloseDate, String userGrp, String location, String desc, String staffInCharge, int totalSlots, int committeeSlots, boolean visibility)
      Adds created camp into the list of created camp
      Parameters:
      campName - Name of the camp
      date - Date that the camp is held
      registerCloseDate - Registration Closing Date
      userGrp - Faculty of this camp
      location - Where the camp is held
      desc - Description of the camp
      staffInCharge - Name of staff that created the camp
      totalSlots - Number of slots available for students to join
      committeeSlots - Number of committee member slots available for students to join (Max 10)
      visibility - Whether the camp can be seen by students
      Returns:
      Camp object created using the parameters

    • AddSuggestion

      public boolean AddSuggestion(int campID, CCM ccm, Suggestions suggestion)
      Add suggestion submitted by committee member to a camp's suggestions list
      Parameters:
      campID - ID of the camp
      ccm - Committee Member that submitted the suggestion
      suggestion - Suggestion submitted
      Returns:
      True once suggestion is added

      ccm - Committee Member that submitted the suggestion
      suggestion - Suggestion submitted
      Returns:
